original_text: And when the queen of Sheba had seen all Solomon's wisdom, and the house that he had built,
korean_text: 스바의 여왕이 솔로몬의 모든 지혜와 그 건축한 왕궁과

sentences.original_text: And when the queen of Sheba had seen all Solomon's wisdom,
sentences.korean_translation: 스바의 여왕이 솔로몬의 모든 지혜를 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: and the house that he had built,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 지은 집을 보았을 때,
